origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinancialAPI.analyze_economic_impact', 'description': 'This function analyzes the economic impact of financial cooperation agreements and projects between two countries.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'country1', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The first country involved in the financial cooperation.'}, {'name': 'country2', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The second country involved in the financial cooperation.'}, {'name': 'agreements', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'The list of financial cooperation agreements and projects to be analyzed.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'impact_analysis', 'description': 'The analysis of the economic impact of the financial cooperation.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinancialAPI.analyze_economic_impact, 它的参数输入如下: 'country1'是'China', 'country2'是'Brazil', 'agreements'是['Agreement1', 'Project2'].
